lender.name: Natural Elements Soap
lender.occupation: High school admin and handcrafted soapmaker
lender.loan_because: It is a way to give back. I am grateful for the opportunity to join with others to step in and support people's efforts where traditional banks will not.
lender.occupational_info:
By day, I work in advancement at a private high school. In the evenings, I formulate and handcraft artistically shaped 100% natural soaps in small batches using eco-friendly processes.
I was motivated to become an entrepreneur myself by a desire to provide a non-toxic, detergent-free, all natural alternative to commercial soaps made with synthetic chemicals and fragrances. I wanted to make soap safe for everybody, including loved ones with autism, allergies, and other illneses that cause them to react negatively to the synthetic chemicals in most soaps.
My business has grown. Thanks to my wonderful customers, I am privileged to be in a position to help other entrepreneurs and to donate a percentage of my company's profits to non-profit organizations that help people.

people given opportunity will improve their own lives and their communities.
We Believe
That faith in God gives meaning and purpose to human life; That the brotherhood of man transcends the sovereignty of nations; That economic justice can best be won by free men through free enterprise; That government should be of laws rather than of men; That earth's great treasure lies in human personality; And that service to humanity is the best work of life. The Jaycee Creed was written by C. William Brownfield in 1946, after attending his first National Convention in Milwaukee, WI. Adopted by the US Jaycees and Jaycees International, this simple statement of beliefs unites Jaycees around the world in a bond of friendship and purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a University and process payments, help students learn about tuition costs and how to apply for student loans.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because:
I believe in giving people a chance to better their lives.
From an economics standpoint, I'd rather have my money circulating and helping the world economy, rather than sitting in my bank account.
I also appreciate that this approach helps to build self-reliance and pride in one's own work. In turn, I feel more connected to the world, and it even helps me overcome some intrinsic learned helplessness. Who would have guessed it could be this easy?
lender.occupational_info: Doing support work involving mice in the greater scheme of defeating cancer.

lender.name: Jadyn
lender.loan_because:
My GramB set me up here at Kiva because she believes to the depths of her heart that microlending is the best way to get meaningful amounts of money into the hands of those who will use it to help themselves/their families, people who will then return the money to be used to help others in the same way.
When I'm older she's hoping I'll want to keep it going. For now, though, she's doing it for me.
lender.occupational_info: Eating. Sleeping. Laughing. Smiling. Trying new foods. Outgrowing clothing. The life of a baby is just jam-packed full of constant change, new adventures and astounding growth and development.

lender.occupational_info: I help a non profit organization called Living Organics. We are always looking for products that are organically grown. I also have a blog for Manna Sachet.

lender.name: Tord
lender.loan_because:
I found this site a couple of years ago, and didn't think about it so much. It was hard to find a person/group to lend the money to. But after seeing a clip about Kiva on BBC, I wanted to give it another try. I will first try a small loan and then go up. But because I don't make any money myself I wont give any big loans yet.
UPDATE 19.09.2010 : My first loan was a success. But, I need the money myself now. And I will be back when I get myself a place to work. My loans then will be bigger than the minimum 25 USD.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a hand up, not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Credit Union - Financial Institution and love to travel with my husband. My current profile picture is from Angkor Wat - Cambodia - 2009.

In all seriousness, I lend because though my contributions may be small, they have the possiblity of making a huge impact.

lender.name: Team Talley
lender.loan_because: Prov. 19:17 He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done.

lender.name: Kimberlee
lender.loan_because: I feel the microloan program reaches out to those who needed help most, people who are hard working and don't like to ask for charity.
lender.occupational_info: Easy and comfortable as compared to many hardworking people throughout the world. I am very blessed.

lender.name: xyrex
lender.loan_because: i want to have a happy life ahead. i want to start a business, that could help my family have a better life. tnx
lender.occupational_info: my work is not easy. but i get a salary that could only support myself. i want to have a happy life.

lender.name: Phil Zinser
lender.loan_because: Thanks God my business grows fast so me and my wife would like to share this blessing with other people across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working for several companies supporting them with online marketing campaigns to promote their business.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Crowdsourcing loans seems like great grassroots way for people to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build software.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I Believe in it.
lender.occupational_info: Help medium/small sized business and individuals grow their ideas through online marketing and design.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I can :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a director of a computer software company.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I believe the only way to make the world a better place is to make people happy. This seems the perfect way to share the wealth and make people happy.

lender.name: Dorian
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: mark venables
lender.loan_because: i want to help people that are having a tough time
lender.occupational_info: i live in Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain and i have a variety of businesses from real estate agent, selling and renting property, designing and building websites, website hosting, website promotion, computer repair, freelance photographer.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Ich habe "Kiva" über Willow Creek Community Church kennen gelernt und das Konzept fasziniert mich.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I regulate companies that are contracted out by the City of Portland to ensure compliance and fairness to the citizens of this city.

lender.name: Luwellyn & Jackie
lender.loan_because:
Some friends need a helping hand, as long as we have we will give.
St. Francis of Assisi said: "For it is in giving that we receive."
lender.occupational_info: Jackie and I are into HR.

lender.name: NICK
lender.loan_because: it's an effective way to support people in developing countries. One 'loan' can we reused to help different people over many years !
lender.occupational_info: Transportation Management System implementation

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to make a small difference in someone's life....... and it feels fabulous to know I was able to help someone in need.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: My wife gave me a gift certificate for Kiva this year for my birthday. She's been enjoying making Kiva loans for years and thought I'd like it, too. She was right. As always.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college professor in the United States.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I respect effort, hard work and sharing.

lender.name: wall44
lender.loan_because: We like to help entrepreneurs around the globe to fulfill their dreams and get a steady income.
lender.occupational_info: We sell affordable art online and from our gallery in Stockholm, Sweden. Wall44 säljer tavlor, oljemålningar canvastryck på nätet och ifrån vår butik i Stockholm

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: I support creative and active entrepreneurs because I received generous support when I was a young entrepreneur myself.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites and blogs.

lender.name: damion
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who want to help themselves. I love business and i love to invest.
lender.occupational_info: I own a real estate company in NYC.

lender.name: Stacia
lender.loan_because: The purpose of life is not to be happy - but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you have lived at all. ~Leo Rosten
lender.occupational_info: It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do little - do what you can. ~Sydney Smith

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to do something small to make a difference in someone else's life...
lender.occupational_info: I process paperwork for the civil division of a local law enforcement agency
